Experience

Professional Experience

A condensed story of the roles where I designed systems, led teams, and iterated quickly. Click any card to expand the journey.

Jan 2022 — Present

Senior Software Engineer

TechCorp Solutions · Bangalore, India

Leading the design and delivery of microservices-based platforms that power enterprise-scale applications.

  • Led multi-team adoption of event-driven services, improving resiliency and reducing MTTR by 35%.
  • Mentored junior engineers through code reviews and architecture clinics, raising team delivery quality.
  • Architected a payments hub that processed 3M+ transactions/day with automated rollbacks and observability baked in.
  • Built CI/CD templates that trim deployment time from hours to minutes through parallel pipelines.
  • Go · Node.js · AWS (EKS, Lambda, DynamoDB)
  • Kafka · Terraform · GitHub Actions

Mar 2020 — Dec 2021

Full-Stack Developer

InnovateTech · Remote

Built and maintained customer-facing products across the stack while collaborating closely with designers and PMs.

  • Delivered five production web applications with responsive UI and A11y-first design.
  • Reduced escaped defects by 30% by institutionalizing component libraries and snapshot testing.
  • Implemented a real-time analytics dashboard with web sockets and serverless ingestion.
  • Led rebuild of onboarding flow that increased activation by 18%.
  • React · TypeScript · GraphQL · Node.js
  • PostgreSQL · AWS Amplify · Cypress

Jun 2019 — Feb 2020

Junior Developer

StartupHub · Bangalore, India

Contributed to MVP builds for fast-paced startups and adopted modern web practices through agile delivery.

  • Partnered with founders to prototype MVPs, iterating weekly on customer feedback.
  • Built CI scripts and deployment guides that enabled non-engineers to ship updates safely.
  • Delivered two cross-platform apps (React Native) for health-tech pilots.
  • Created dashboards for seed-stage founders to monitor growth metrics.
  • React · React Native · Express
  • MongoDB · Firebase · Docker

Engineering College
